ygData.msgSnippet: As two more missiles strike his durable hide Motormaster growls in a fury. If he wasnt upset before he certainly is now. With a swift motion he transforms, now

Date: Sun, 21 Jan 2001 16:56:28 -0700
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
Subject: Re: The Alliance
From: Robert Dahl <rdahl@...>

As two more missiles strike his durable hide Motormaster growls in a fury.
If he wasnt upset before he certainly is now. With a swift motion he
transforms, now clutching a sword in his left hand, the top of his head and
side of his left arm smoking incredibaly, where the armor was hit from his
foes. He levitates from the ground towards the airborn Recklessa, not much
of an expression in his doom stricken eyes. "You my friend," he starts to
boom, his voice different from before, much more hollow, and devoid of
kidness, "are quite a pain in the tailpipe" flying towards his target with
murderous intent in his eyes.
